materials.value: a pinch of crushed obsidian, a scrap of rag

description.value:
You touch a creature. The creature is warded against the effects of @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]{faerie fire}, @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4]{hold person}, and @Compendium[koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.KPorderofrevenge]{order of revenge} for the duration of the effect, granting them advantage on the saving throw against the effect and a saving throw each round they are affected by the spells. If the warded creature is the focus of @Compendium[dnd5e.spells.gXtzz9t1DTzJeLr4]{locate creature}, the caster may determine if the affected creature is within 1,000 feet but cannot determine the direction to the target of vagrant's nondescript cloak. If the creature is already affected by one of the warded spells, then both the effect and vagrant's nondescript cloak end immediately.
At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of third level or higher, you can target +1 creature for each slot level above second.
